messages.welcomeMessage: Embark on a language journey with us – where every word learned is a step towards a world of possibilities!

Folder.numberOfModules: {number, plural, =0 {Folder is empty} =1 {Folder has # module} other {Folder has # modules}}

Module.numberOfTerms: {number, plural, =1 {Module has # term} other {Module has # terms}}

confettiScreen.continueLearning: Continue learning - {count, plural, =1 {# term} other {# terms}} left

inspirationalMessages.0: Great job! You're simply a master of flashcards! Keep up the good work!
inspirationalMessages.1: Well done! You breezed through this module. Keep it up and keep moving forward!
inspirationalMessages.2: Bravo! You're like a true pro at studying flashcards. Keep it up, and you'll become a real expert!
inspirationalMessages.3: Wow! You just conquered this module! Your efforts haven't gone unnoticed. Keep it up, and onwards to new heights!
inspirationalMessages.4: Wow! You're a star at studying flashcards. Congratulations on successfully completing this module!
inspirationalMessages.5: Great work! Your knowledge is growing rapidly. Keep moving forward – you're on the right track!
inspirationalMessages.6: Well done! You're absolutely fantastic. Remember, every module completed brings you closer to mastery!
inspirationalMessages.7: Congratulations! You've successfully completed this stage. Now you're even closer to your goal. Keep it up!
inspirationalMessages.8: Oh wow! You're a real champion. Keep it up, and you'll become a true expert in studying flashcards!
inspirationalMessages.9: Bravo! You're simply unstoppable! Your determination and diligence are truly impressive. Keep it up!

updateEmail.title: Update email
updateEmail.mailVerificationMessage: Your current email is {currentEmail}. We'll send a temporary verification code to this email.

Placeholders.folder: Enter name for the folder, like: 'grammar'...

Placeholders.name: Enter your name

min.newPassword: At least {min, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}
min.currentPassword: At least {min, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}
min.password: At least {min, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}
min.name: At least {min, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}
min.birthday: Must be at least {min, plural, =1 {# year} other {# years}} old

length.code: Must be exactly {length, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}
